about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! I'm Ignacio Muñoz, a computer engineering student with a great passion for technology and problem-solving. I love developing software and optimizing algorithms. Here you'll find my projects, experience, and what motivates me in the world of technology.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: End-to-end web application development with React, Node.js and modern databases

api.title: API Development
api.description: Design and implementation of scalable and secure REST and GraphQL APIs

database.title: Database Design
database.description: Architecture and optimization of SQL and NoSQL databases

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.description: Deployment and automation with Docker, CI/CD and cloud services

educationData.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Natural and Exact Sciences

experienceData.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Developed a microservice for chatbot integration using PHP, JavaScript, and Python.
Collaborated with the development team to improve system integration and efficiency.
Performed code testing and debugging to ensure proper functionality.

experienceData.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js.
Implemented RESTful APIs and scalable backend services.
Collaborated on PostgreSQL database architecture design.
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers.
